
# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book covers material for Math 219, Data Science 1, at the University of Delaware. 

This site was made with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/books).

## Prerequisites

Prior experience with single-variable calculus (basic differentiation and integration) and with base Python are expected.
